messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant with access to tools. When the user asks you to delegate complex tasks, use the task tool.
Create a comprehensive analysis of the project structure and dependencies

function.name: task
function.description: Launches a specialized agent to handle complex multi-step tasks autonomously
